name: ClpMessage
brief:
Message codes and localization for Clp solver output

Defines the CLP_Message enum with all status and diagnostic message codes
used by Clp during optimization. Messages are organized by solver phase:
- CLP_SIMPLEX_*: General simplex status (finished, infeasible, etc.)
- CLP_DUAL_*: Dual simplex specific messages
- CLP_PRIMAL_*: Primal simplex specific messages
- CLP_BARRIER_*: Interior point method messages

ClpMessage inherits from CoinMessages to provide localized message text.
Control output verbosity via ClpSimplex::setLogLevel().
see: CoinMessageHandler in CoinUtils for the messaging infrastructure
